title: kjlimo
author: kjlimo
content: What are your plans for bitcoin pizza day this year?Bummer that it falls on a Sunday!I've only got 3 restaurants that accept bitcoin lightning network in my area and all three are closed on Sundays... However, Tuesday, I am planning a get together in Brecksville, Ohio at Juice Lab.8215 Chippewa Rd, Brecksville, OH 44141https://www.facebook.com/events/773334983654515/?sfnsn=moIf you're interested in ordering and paying using the bitcoin lightning network, the owner, Dom will accept payment. It's been about a year since I first used the lightning network at Juice Lab, so perhaps we can call Tuesday "Bitcoin Juice Day," haha.Happy early bitcoin pizza day!

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: Aha- I’m going to a small crypto Meetup on Sunday evening - it’s already been mentioned that it’s Bitcoin Pizza Day in the group  and if there’s pizza on the menu , we’ll have it  Enjoy your evening and meal OP

comments.body: So bitcoin buys about 3 pizzas every year.Visa must be getting very worried

comments.author: rdbase
comments.body: Pizza day for bitcoin falling on a Sunday makes it difficult to find a place that accepts it to purchase your favorite slice so to commemorate the day.If you happen to lightning network certainly makes it easier. Will make it just be as fast as paying it by credit card.Wonder what the owner of that Papa Johns did with all those bitcoins.HODL the majority or probably cashed out alot of them by now.

Will make it just be as fast as paying it by credit card.Wonder what the owner of that Papa Johns did with all those bitcoins.HODL the majority or probably cashed out alot of them by now.Lightning network is several days faster than credit card.  It takes days for credit card payments to make it to the merchant... lightning bitcoin can be used instantly like cash, but digital!Let's remind everyone how BPD went down in 2010... Laszlo, in Florida sent 10,000 bitcoin to someone in Europe. That person in Europe called Papa Johns in FLA and had pizzas delivered to Laszlo.The person in Europe has said they gave many away trying to get folks to use them.

comments.author: worle1bm
comments.body: Not much of plans for that day as will try to make one for me and friends in backyard of the house to celebrate the day.Last year i ordered two pizzas on the day and enjoyed with the family outside but this time will have some good time in home only and try to make one in the House only.So enjoy your day despite it being on Sunday.

comments.author: lepbagong
comments.body: Quote from: PX-Z on May 19, 2022, 11:49:54 PMNothing much. Maybe just pizza snack with fam, good time its a feast on my place on that day since there's no pizza store that accept bitcoin or crypto here in my area.be happy, you can enjoy pizza by paying with bitcoin, because until now in my country it will be difficult to find a place that can accept payments with bitcoin, because bitcoin is not allowed to be used in general to be used as a legal payment. if you want to buy pizza and the like then you can first exchange it with fiat. it's still quite a hassle but it's still tolerable that bitcoin exchange is not banned.

comments.author: romero121
comments.body: Adding memory to my life connective to the pizza day I've planned to buy a pizza and enjoy the evening with my family. The Pizza Corner from which I've planned to buy Pizza doesn't have bitcoin acceptance. Hope the small memories we add tagging #Pizzaday will make people look for what is pizza day. Even my girl doesn't know about it, I take this a right time to give her a detailed story about the incident that happened years back.

comments.author: Leviathan.007
comments.body: Interesting to see pizza day in a day in the bitcoin bearish phase and the price falling so some newbies were doing panic selling at lower prices while they can hold and all they need to do is to be patient and don't fall into the emotional trap just like happened on the pizza day. The guy who owned this amount of bitcoins and sold bitcoins because he didn't truly leave on it and couldn't hold it, I believe a few years later when the price reached much higher price the people who sold their asset at price will have the same feelings of the guy who traded bitcoins for a pizza.

comments.author: Kemarit
comments.body: Yeah, probably order some Pizza or go out with my family (if the weather is good), just to celebrate and it will be the right time to tell my kids about BTC + pizza history.But obviously, I can't used by Bitcoin though, as no one is accepting it at my place, although there are a lot of crypto enthusiast in my country, they are not ready to have Bitcoin as a payment options.
